item.title: CS139-lecture-20211207
item.description: Disk scheduling exercise # File systems # The file system is an abstraction of the collection of disk blocks. Requirements on data # Files # File names # inode = index node Interface to file system # Directories # requires unique filenames requires unique pathnames this allows multiple users to work on the same file (groups) recall “acyclic” means the graph does not contain a cycle Directory operations #
